South Station Elevator 918 (Ashmont/Braintree platform to Airport/Design Center/Chelsea platform and lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: To exit the Red Line, use nearby South Station Elevator 901. To board the Red Line, use South Station Elevator 901 located on the opposide side of the lobby. To board the Silver Line, take Elevator 901 to the Silver Line drop-off platform, then take South Station Elevator 927 to the Alewife platform. At the Alewife platform, use nearby South Station Elevator 919 to access the Airport/Design Center/Chelsea platform.
